xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 11 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:12 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:19 <sdumitriu> Hey ravigarg27 13:21 <ravigarg27> hii sdumitriu 13:21 <sdumitriu> Done with exams? 13:21 <ravigarg27> yup today only 13:21 <ravigarg27> phew 13:21 <ravigarg27> :) 13:22 <sdumitriu> All good? 13:22 <ravigarg27> yeah yeah 13:22 <sdumitriu> Congratulations! 13:23 <ravigarg27> hehe 13:23 <ravigarg27> thanks 13:23 <ravigarg27> but will reserve that for results 13:23 <ravigarg27> Will start work on project from tomorrow 13:24 <ravigarg27> once again and look into the points you mentioned before 13:25 <ravigarg27> i wanted to ask you something actually 13:26 <sdumitriu> Shoot 13:27 <ravigarg27> Nothing technical as of now just that Is it possible to contribute to Phenotips after GSoC also? 13:29 <ravigarg27> I mean if I am interested in doing some project and work on that will you accept that outside of GSoC too 13:33 <sdumitriu> Sure 13:33 <ravigarg27> :) 13:33 <sdumitriu> The most simple way is to contribute as to any open source project 13:34 <sdumitriu> Or you can apply for graduate studies in prof. Brudno's lab 13:35 <sdumitriu> Or we might have some funding for someone not in Toronto a bit later 13:36 <sdumitriu> There are options 13:37 <ravigarg27> oh nice I actually have an year long bachelor thesis options in my university. I would love to spend the year work with you if possible 13:37 <sdumitriu> Sure 13:37 <sdumitriu> We have enough ideas for many years 13:38 <sdumitriu> http://phenotips.org/tools/PhenotypesSearch -> related to your project 13:39 <ravigarg27> I also have a couple of ideas which I would love to discuss with soon 13:39 <ravigarg27> :) 13:42 <ravigarg27> Will talk about that soon once I am ready with a basic prototype 14:01 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 14:08 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 14:39 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 16:04 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 16:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu 16:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Is that you Guest69911 ? 16:10 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 16:15 <Guest69911> Yeah, me 16:15 <Guest69911> Hold on 16:15 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 16:21 <kushalkhandelwal> Hello 16:21 <kushalkhandelwal> I thought how come you not on line today 16:22 <kushalkhandelwal> Good evening :) 16:45 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, Busy ? 16:57 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 17:03 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, There ? 17:18 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 18:15 <Guest55878> Hi Guest52333 18:43 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 21:04 <phenotips_org> has joined #ccm
